amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph entitled Offshore Exclusion which shall not include oil and gas leasing in any tract located off the coast of Virginia.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a new paragraph entitled Offshore Exclusion which shall not include oil and gas leasing in any tract located off the coast of Virginia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 45).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Spanberger.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 45).
